articles.title: Rivian Spin-Off ‘ALSO' Unveils Unique, Modular TM-B Ebike
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Rivian's micromobility spinoff has revealed its first product: the innovative TM-B ebike. The company also hinted at future product releases.

articles.title: NEO: The pricey new robot that's a domestic dream
articles.summary: 1X, backed by OpenAI, has opened pre-orders for its humanoid robot, NEO, designed for household chores. The robot will initially require remote human operators for complex tasks, with first units expected to ship in the US in 2026 and in Europe and Asia in 2027. Pre-orders are available with a $200 deposit, pricing early buyers at $20,000 or a $499 monthly subscription.

articles.title: Startalyst.ai Launches Revolutionary AI-Powered Personalized Business Idea Generator Platform for Entrepreneurs
articles.author: Startalyst
articles.summary: Startalyst.ai has launched an AI business idea generator platform designed to help entrepreneurs worldwide turn their interests into actionable business ideas. The platform analyzes user backgrounds and resources to craft tailored startup ideas. Additionally, Startalyst.ai's upcoming AI website builder will allow entrepreneurs to instantly create professional websites directly from within the platform.

articles.title: DreamSofa DreamModular™ Sectional Redefines Furniture Forever! Meet Landon, the Best Modular Sectional
articles.summary: Dreamsofa has launched the DreamModular™ Landon Sectional, a tool-free modular furniture system designed for flexibility and durability. The sectional allows for easy reconfiguration into various shapes and is engineered for long-term stability, catering to dynamic living environments and evolving design needs.

articles.title: Milton Hydro Honoured with Milton Chamber of Commerce Excellence in Innovation Award
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Milton Hydro launched a new cloud-based OMNI-channel customer service platform in 2024. The system integrates phone, email, and online support and uses AI to enhance customer service with faster response times and 24/7 accessibility.

articles.title: Netflix is adding 3 exciting new features. Here's what to know
articles.author: Penn Live
articles.summary: Netflix is updating its platform with new features to improve the viewing experience. The updates include "Dinner Time Live with David Chang."

articles.title: Exciting Changes & New Adventures at Code Wiz Lawrenceville!
articles.author: Code Wiz Lawrenceville
articles.summary: Code Wiz Lawrenceville is introducing new courses and programs to fuel children's passion for technology, offering both foundational and advanced topics. They are also expanding learning options with instructor-led virtual classes and welcoming a wider community of learners by expanding their age range. Furthermore, they offer to host events.

articles.title: AI Canvas Unifies Image, Video, and Design in a Single iOS App for Everything Visual
articles.summary: AI Canvas has announced the expansion of its all-in-one creative platform, a single iOS app built to handle image generation, video creation, and design. It offers features like background removal, object erasing, upscaling, recoloring, text-driven edits, dynamic camera movements, AI actions and emotions, speech generation, and quality upscaling. The app is available now on iOS.

articles.title: Pinterest's new shopping assistant finds products to fit your tastes - see how it works
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Pinterest is utilizing AI to improve its shopping service. This aims to keep the platform's shopping experience fresh and engaging for users.

articles.title: Amajimbos gifted Honor phones post-World Cup
articles.author: Sowetan Live
articles.summary: Honor is launching the new Honor X7d 5G.

articles.title: M&S launches new ‘secret support' pants that offer men a ‘subtle lift'
articles.author: Mark Brown
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer (M&S) has launched a new range of 'secret support pants' for men. These cotton trunks offer 'a subtle lift and enhanced fit' through a new internal pouch that discreetly lifts and supports 'all day long', aiming to boost men's confidence.

articles.title: Microsoft releases an Xbox Full Screen Experience preview for the MSI Claw
articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.summary: Microsoft is rolling out its Xbox Full Screen Experience (FSE) in preview to MSI Claw models as part of the latest Windows 11 Insider Preview Build. This console-like navigation experience is designed for Windows PC gaming handhelds. FSE is also planned to be enabled on handhelds from additional OEMs in the coming months.

articles.title: Tesla Robotaxi test units spotted in new region ahead of launch
articles.author: Joey Klender
articles.summary: Tesla is testing its Robotaxi in a new region. This testing occurs before the anticipated launch of the Robotaxi.

articles.title: How smart brands use color to boost their bottom line
articles.author: Sky Kelley
articles.summary: Philips selected a bold yellow-green for its OneBlade Hybrid Razor to appeal to young Italian men. Kraft standardized the Heinz 57 Red globally, leading to increased brand recognition and ketchup usage in Turkey. These examples highlight the strategic use of color to influence consumer perception and drive sales for new and existing products.

articles.title: Morning coffee just got cheaper with Nespresso
articles.summary: Nespresso is offering a refurbished Vertuo Pop+ coffee machine for $84.99, a significant discount from its regular price of $129.99. The Vertuo Pop+ features one-touch brewing, personalized cup settings via the Nespresso app, and a creative mode for concentrated brews, making it suitable for both hot and iced drinks. It is a compact device that comes with a removable water tank.

articles.title: An Internet of Shit
articles.author: Vince Mancini
articles.summary: Samsung is introducing a new software update to its Family Hub smart fridges, adding a widget that displays advertisements on the fridge's screen. This update will roll out to US-based fridges with larger screens, starting with ads appearing soon after the initial release.

articles.title: Meet the new generative AI solution to help SMEs with tariff compliance
articles.author: Barrie Today
articles.summary: Peacock Tariff Consulting and PRAKTIKAI have launched TariffEdge. TariffEdge is a new AI tool.

articles.title: 8 Popular Chinese Appetizers That Everyone Should Try Once
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Zomato now offers a variety of Chinese appetizers for order, including Veg Spring Rolls, Chicken Momos, Crispy Chilli Potatoes, and more. These dishes provide customers with a convenient way to enjoy restaurant-quality appetizers from the comfort of their homes.

articles.title: Pecan shortbread, Jollof spice blend and more Southern-made products to try
articles.author: C.W. Cameron
articles.summary: The article highlights 12 Southern-made food products to try in November, including deviled eggs and canned esquites. These products are being presented to consumers.

articles.title: We Tested Three of the Internet's Buzziest Skincare Launches. Do You Need Them?
articles.summary: Prequel offers the Half & Half Fluid Moisturizer, a lightweight product suitable for hydrating the skin, priced at $26 and is available at prequelskin.com, Amazon, and Target. Rhode introduces the Glazing Mist, a hydrating mist providing a glowy and plump look and is available for $30 at rhodeskin.com and Sephora. Fur presents the Flash Repair Jelly, designed to reduce irritation after shaving, retailing at $36 and sold at furyou.com and Amazon.

articles.title: 26 Incredibly Practical Walmart Products Anyone Over The Age Of 25 Should Know About
articles.author: Emily Schildt
articles.summary: Pantene introduces Pro-V Volume and Body Shampoo priced at $6.97, favored for its deep-cleaning abilities. Milani launches a setting spray for $16.97, designed to lock in makeup while hydrating the skin. Tide offers a laundry and carpet stain remover for $4.97, effective for removing various stains from clothing and carpets.

articles.title: Dunelm heated pod dries clothes super fast and costs just 18p an hour to run
articles.author: Kat Romero
articles.summary: Dunelm has introduced the Clothes Dryer Pod, priced at £55, which dries clothes quickly using a ceramic heating element and features a 3-hour timer and overheat protection. It consumes 18p per run and folds for easy storage. In addition, Dunelm also sells Over Radiator Airers for less than £3.

articles.title: 1X's NEO Robot Steps Into the Home
articles.author: Oumaima Moho Amer
articles.summary: 1X Technologies has launched the NEO, a humanoid robot designed for household use. Priced at $20,000 or available for rent at $499 per month, NEO can perform tasks like folding laundry and washing dishes, with deliveries expected in 2026. The robot relies on both AI and, in certain situations, human operators for assistance.

articles.title: MVP for MPV
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: Toyota launched the Innova HyCross, featuring SUV styling and hybrid efficiency. This new model aims to redefine its segment.

articles.title: Hilltop adds Smoky Chipotle and Peri-Peri hot honey condiments
articles.author: Niamh Leonard-Bedwell
articles.summary: Hilltop is launching two new hot honey condiments, Smoky Chipotle and Peri-Peri, exclusively into Tesco in November. This introduction follows the success of Hilltop's original Hot Honey, which launched in February 2024. The new range aims to attract younger shoppers with bold, adventurous flavors.

articles.title: Homeowners urged to scoop up $7 ‘cleaner kit' from Walmart before the clocks turn back
articles.author: Kate Kulniece
articles.summary: Walmart has slashed the price of its DRYVENCK Dryer Vent Cleaner Kit, now available for $7.49, and it helps prevent fire risks. Walmart also introduced Scan and Go system that allows customers to scan items as they shop, pay, and leave without waiting in long checkout lines.

articles.title: NozzlePro Officially Launches: New Division of SuperKlean Washdown Products Opens Online Store with In-Stock Industrial Spray Nozzles Ready to Ship
articles.author: Dayang Norazhar
articles.summary: SuperKlean Washdown Products launched a new division called NozzlePro, which provides industrial spray nozzles. NozzlePro also launched its online store, nozzle-pro.com, offering a wide selection of spray nozzles that are in stock and ready to ship.

articles.title: ENRICH India Capital Partners with Nova Nova to Transform Gen Z Snacking Trends in India
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: ENRICH India Capital has partnered with Nova Nova to expand the snack food company's product advancement, marketing initiatives, and distribution network in India. The investment will fuel Nova Nova's development of innovative snack products tailored to Gen Z preferences, expanding its reach beyond major metropolitan areas and into Tier 2 and Tier 3 cities.

articles.title: House of Beaut Expands Independent Marketplace with New Global Skincare, Body Care, and Wellness Launches
articles.summary: House of Beaut has expanded its online marketplace with new independent brands, including Aishani (body care), Munch (skincare), Chatelier (skincare), Nuchu (supplements), The Sporty Muse (wellness), and Becoming Her by Self Care Girl (e-book). These additions broaden House of Beaut's offerings in skincare, body care, wellness, and digital self-care, emphasizing craftsmanship, transparency, and conscious innovation.

articles.title: InventHelp Inventor Develops New Air Freshener Design (NPL-498)
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: An inventor has developed a new air freshener design named FAN FRESH as an alternative to traditional plug-in air fresheners. The design is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers through InventHelp.

articles.title: Zepto Tops LinkedIn's 2025 Mumbai Startups List; Snabbit Joins the Top 10
articles.author: Business Desk
articles.summary: Zepto, a 10-minute grocery delivery platform, tops LinkedIn's Mumbai list for 2025 and also leads in Delhi and Bengaluru. Snabbit, a quick-commerce entrant, offers on-demand home services, and Pocket FM launched an AI creator studio for writers.

articles.title: AI 3D Tool Raises $4.1M for Copilot Features
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Adam, a Y Combinator startup, is launching an AI-powered CAD copilot to democratize 3D design. Initially focused on consumers, they are now targeting the enterprise market with integration into cloud-based CAD programs like Onshape. Their upcoming copilot blends text prompts with more direct interaction methods, improving upon traditional text-to-3D tools.

articles.title: Where is the Trump phone?
articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.summary: Trump Mobile's T1 Phone, also known as the Trump Phone, has missed its initially promised August launch date and subsequent September and October estimates. The company has remained silent, failing to provide updates on the release, which is now vaguely slated for 'later this year'.

articles.title: TWOPAGES Marks 10 Years of Craftsmanship, Innovation, and Connection as Founder Ray Chen Reflects on the Journey
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: TWOPAGES, a home decor brand, celebrated its 10th anniversary by reflecting on its mission to simplify window treatment solutions. The company focuses on combining craftsmanship with innovation using technology such as smart measurement tools and virtual consultations to enhance the customer experience and provide customizable solutions. TWOPAGES also held TWOPAGES TOGETHER × Design Contest to explore new expressions of window aesthetics.

articles.title: Derby-based Alphageek expands international footprint with new Dubai office
articles.author: Sarah Newton
articles.summary: Alphageek, a marketing agency, has launched a new office in Dubai to serve as a hub for growth across the Middle East and North Africa. This expansion allows Alphageek to bring its data-driven marketing expertise to brands in the region and explore opportunities in the D2C sector. The company aims to help businesses in the area scale through smarter digital performance.

articles.title: DFY Vending Revolutionizes with Nationwide Expansion of Turnkey Vending Solutions
articles.summary: DFY Vending is expanding its turnkey vending solutions nationwide. These solutions offer automated, customizable vending machines with features like automated product refills, remote monitoring, customizable offerings, eco-friendly options, and 24/7 customer support. This expansion aims to provide businesses with convenient and efficient vending services.

articles.title: Monster Mixers: Mother-daughter duo casts a spell on dirty soda fans
articles.author: Daisha Jones
articles.summary: Creamy Pop LLC has introduced 'dirty sodas', a drink made with soda, flavor shots, cream, and fruit or syrups, inspired by 'The Secret Lives of Mormon Wives.' The company offers a menu of these beverages.

articles.title: Buying An Air Purifier? Here's What Really Matters, According To An Expert
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: Dyson's Research Director is providing expert insights on what to look for when buying an air purifier, covering aspects such as filtration, coverage, and smart features. This suggests potential new features or updates related to Dyson's air purifier products.

articles.title: NordVPN introduces adult site blocking feature for safer browsing
articles.author: Nord VPN
articles.summary: NordVPN has introduced adult site blocking to its Threat Protection suite, allowing users to automatically block adult websites on Android and iOS devices. This new feature employs DNS filtering to prevent access to adult domains before they load, providing an additional layer of protection against unwanted content while maintaining VPN encryption benefits.

articles.title: Foyr Introduces AI Hub, Bringing Generative AI to Interior Design and Home Remodeling
articles.author: Foyr LLC
articles.summary: Foyr launched a new AI Hub within its Foyr Neo platform. The release introduces generative AI features. These AI features transform how interior design and home remodeling professionals bring client ideas to life.

articles.title: NordVPN introduces adult site blocking feature for safer browsing
articles.author: Nord VPN
articles.summary: NordVPN has introduced adult site blocking to its Threat Protection suite for Android and iOS mobile devices. This new feature uses DNS filtering to prevent access to thousands of adult domains, providing an extra layer of protection against unwanted content while maintaining VPN encryption.

articles.title: New Bullring shop Bath and Body Works 'rammed' as it opens with 'great value' deals
articles.author: Kirsty Bosley
articles.summary: Bath and Body Works opened a new store in the Bullring on October 31st, welcoming its first customers with gift bags. The store features a variety of products including Christmas products, cleansing gel hand soaps, body washes, moisturizing creams and lotions. Promotions include four full-sized body products for the price of two.

articles.title: Foyr Introduces AI Hub, Bringing Generative AI to Interior Design and Home Remodeling
articles.author: Foyr LLC
articles.summary: Foyr launched its new AI Hub within its flagship platform, Foyr Neo, introducing generative AI features. The AI Hub enables designers to convert images to 3D models, enhance rendering quality, and apply design styles to existing renderings, improving client engagement.

articles.title: Shareholders of Baxter International, Inc. Should Contact Levi & Korsinsky Before December 15, 2025 to Discuss Your Rights
articles.summary: Baxter International, Inc.'s recently launched product, the Novum LVP, suffered from systemic defects causing malfunctions and harm to patients. The company was notified of these issues but their attempts to address them were inadequate, potentially leading to a pause in new sales. These issues have resulted in a class action lawsuit.

articles.title: New Mexican and Rocketslaw salads launched in New Zealand
articles.summary: LeaderBrand has launched two new salad products, Mexican and Rocketslaw, in New Zealand. These products, featuring locally grown produce and convenient dressings, are available in major supermarkets and cater to the growing consumer demand for Mexican-style meals.

articles.title: Market Report: How to Identify the Best Airless Packaging Manufacturer in China in 2025
articles.summary: TOPFEELPACK, a leading airless packaging manufacturer in China, offers innovative and customizable solutions for beauty and personal care brands. Their airless packaging protects sensitive formulations, extends shelf life, and maintains product potency. TOPFEELPACK's solutions cater to various applications, including skincare serums, makeup, and haircare products, ensuring product integrity and enhancing brand value.

articles.title: Dunelm shoppers love clever duvet that makes the bed 'in seconds'
articles.author: Eve Wagstaff
articles.summary: Dunelm offers the Catherine Lansfield cosy cord coverless duvet, priced at £40. It is made from 100% polyester with a soft-touch cord finish and a 6.5 tog rating.  Available in natural, silver, and navy, the duvet fits a double bed and is machine washable, making bed-making faster and easier.

articles.title: When AI knows what your heart wants: RJ Mahvash and Tushar Khanna discover the perfect Gift with Galaxy Z Fold7
articles.author: SPOTLIGHT
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy Z Fold7, an intelligent foldable phone with flagship performance, AI integration, and stunning dual displays. The phone features a re-engineered design for slimness and durability, a 200 MP camera, and a 4400 mAh battery, and is available starting at â¹174,999 with festive season discounts and offers.

articles.title: Best 9 Kg washing machines for large families apt for heavy laundry loads: Top 8 choices for powerful washing
articles.summary: The article reviews and compares 9 Kg washing machines from brands including Samsung, LG, IFB, Bosch and Voltas Beko. The article highlights features like AI Ecobubble (Samsung), AI Direct Drive (LG), Power Steam (IFB), Anti Stain (Bosch), and Double Waterfall Technology (Voltas Beko) along with smart features such as Wi-Fi connectivity and Hygiene Steam, and different spin speeds for varied performance.

articles.title: BYD Car Achieves Record Sales with 1,000 Units Sold Daily!
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: BYD has launched three new vehicles in Pakistan. These include the all-electric BYD Atto 3 crossover, the all-electric BYD Seal mid-size sedan, and the plug-in hybrid electric vehicle (PHEV) BYD Sealion 6 mid-size crossover.

articles.title: 42 Cheap Versions Of Expensive Products That Will Make Any Thirtysomething Go 'Oooh'
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: E.l.f launched Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara. The Mascara uses tubing technology for thin or fragile lashes. It's presented as a cheaper alternative to the Blinc version.

articles.title: From Screens to Scenes, LG's AI TVs Bring Life, Comfort and Connection Together » YNaija
articles.author: Crypto Journalist
articles.summary: LG Electronics Nigeria introduced its latest AI Smart TVs, including OLED, QNED, NanoCell, and UHD models, powered by the LG ThinQ AI platform. To enhance affordability, LG partnered with Ecobank Nigeria to offer an Easy Monthly Installment (EMI) Scheme for these TVs and other LG appliances. The company also showcased how its AI ecosystem extends to other product categories such as washing machines, refrigerators and air conditioners.

articles.title: Not enough people are talking about this budget Android phone that's feature-rich
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Oukitel has a phone with a large screen, a big battery, and impressive performance.

articles.title: iSqueeze and Numilk roll out alternative milk dispensing machines
articles.author: Charles Elliman
articles.summary: iSqueeze partners with Numilk to introduce Numilk's alternative milk dispensing machine to the UK market, offering fresh plant-based milks at the push of a button. iSqueeze also sells three collections of Numilk barista milk drinks and ready-to-serve speciality lattes, ranging from almond and oat lines to matcha and pistachio.

articles.title: This is Google's first entirely AI-generated ad.
articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.summary: Google created its first entirely AI-generated advertisement. Google doesn't plan to create all ads with tools like Veo 3.

articles.title: Parents favour kidswear brand Sprog for its skin-safe, sustainable infant gifting range
articles.summary: Sprog, a babywear label, is experiencing strong demand due to its focus on trust, safety, and reliability in its clothing. The company uses 100% combed cotton, azo-free dyes, and toxin-free processes, with dermatologist-backed safety to ensure that every garment is safe and non-irritating for sensitive baby skin.

articles.title: I try Aldi's £6 Double Wear-inspired foundation before its launch– see the results
articles.author: Zoe Cripps
articles.summary: Aldi is launching its new Lacura True Base Foundation on November 23rd, priced at £5.99. This new product from Aldi's Lacura range promises full coverage, a flawless matte finish and long-lasting wear, and is being compared to Estée Lauder's Double Wear foundation. The Aldi foundation comes in six shades.

articles.title: Next Step In Agentic Ad Creation: Testing ‘Model Context Protocol'
articles.author: Laurie Sullivan
articles.summary: Rembrand, an AI content-creation platform, will test a Model Context Protocol (MCP) server. This server will interact with AI agents to generate advertisements. The MCP is part of the Advertising Context Protocol (AdCP) initiative.

articles.title: Boots, Dyson and Currys launch Black Friday sales four weeks early
articles.author: Jen Thomas
articles.summary: Several companies including Boots, Dyson, AO.com, Currys, and Morphy Richards have launched early Black Friday deals. Boots is offering deals on fragrances like Yves Saint Laurent Black Opium EDP Over Red, Currys has the Ninja MAX 6-in-1 dual zone air fryer at a record low price, AO.com features the Sage Barista Express, Dyson offers a discount on its designer hair dryer, and Morphy Richards promotes its Sauté & Soup machine.

articles.title: Samsung Bespoke Jet Bot Combo AI+ robot vacuum cleaner review: This high-tech robot vacuum mops your floors and lets you watch it clean in real time but is it worth paying over £1000?
articles.author: DANIELLE AMATO
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Bespoke Jet Bot Combo AI+, a robot vacuum cleaner and mop with features like 3D object recognition, a LiDAR sensor, and a live camera feed. The Jet Bot Combo AI+ offers enhanced mopping and suction, and it can self-empty, clean its mopping pads, and drop them off when not in use, and it competes with products from Dyson and Eufy.

articles.title: 31 Game-Changing Cleaning Products For Your Home
articles.author: Celia Funderburk
articles.summary: The article highlights several cleaning products, some of which are new or recently upgraded, for home cleaning purposes. Tineco introduced a 2-in-1 cordless vacuum and mop and Shark Steam & Scrub introduced a steam mop. The article also mentions other product innovations like Wet & Forget cleaner, Bissell Stomp 'N Go stain-removing pads, and Angry Orange pet odor and stain eliminator.

articles.title: 28 Hydrating Skincare Products For Cold, Dry Weather
articles.author: Kit Stone
articles.summary: Several companies are introducing new skincare products. Sincerely Yours launched the kindly clean foaming gel cleanser, Naturium launched bestselling restoring body lotion , Thayers launched a milky face toner , Cremo launched a luxurious body wash, Sol de Janeiro launched Delícia Drench moisturizing shower oil and Peach & Lilly launched a Power Calm Gel Cleanser. These products are designed to hydrate, soothe, and improve skin texture, catering to various skin concerns and preferences.

articles.title: Make Your Old Geyser Smart: Control It With Your Phone Or Voice In Minutes!
articles.author: Parishmita Saikia
articles.summary: Several companies, including Wipro, TP-Link, Zebronics, Portronics, and Syska, offer smart plugs that can upgrade existing geysers into smart, remotely controllable devices. These smart plugs connect to Wi-Fi, can be controlled via smartphone apps or voice assistants like Alexa and Google Assistant, and can automate geyser schedules, offering a cost-effective alternative to replacing the entire geyser unit. The smart plugs offer features like remote on/off control, timer setting and auto cut off to save energy and prevent overheating.

articles.title: New Bullring shop opens today with freebies for customers
articles.author: Kirsty Bosley
articles.summary: Bath and Body Works opened its first store in Birmingham's Bullring on October 31st. The store launch included free goodie bags for the first 50 customers and other surprises for those in line. The location features a range of Bath and Body Works products including seasonal favorites like Vanilla Bean Noel and Twisted Peppermint.

articles.title: Samsung Brings Its Web Browser to Windows with AI Ambitions
articles.summary: Samsung has launched a desktop version of its Samsung Internet browser for Windows 10 and Windows 11, expanding its software ecosystem. This release is part of Samsung's plan to evolve the browser into an integrated AI platform.

articles.title: FanttikRide Brings Joy to a Child With a Customized Left-Pedal Wiggle Car
articles.summary: FanttikRide is launching the N10 Classic electric wiggle car. This product features dual manual and electric riding modes, 360° spinning, adjustable speed settings, a smart voice safety system, dynamic RGB lights, a built-in Bluetooth speaker, and a detachable mop. Special promotions on the N10 Classic and other models are expected for Black Friday and Christmas sales.

articles.title: LG to team up with Nvidia on physical AI, digital twins
articles.summary: LG Electronics is partnering with Nvidia to advance next-generation technologies, focusing on physical AI and digital twin systems. LG is developing a physical AI model based on Nvidia's Isaac GR00T for robotics and seeking Nvidia certification for its coolant distribution unit for AI data centers. Additionally, LG is using Nvidia's Omniverse for digital twins at its global manufacturing sites to enhance production efficiency.

articles.title: The luxury of choice
articles.author: Marysia Bellamy
articles.summary: Lexus is exploring the RX450h+, a new plug-in hybrid vehicle.

articles.title: ⚡Check iQOO Neo 11 Price, Specifications and Features Ahead of India Launch
articles.summary: iQOO launched the iQOO Neo 11 smartphone in China, featuring a Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, a large battery, and a dual-camera system. The device presents an upgraded design from the previous generation and is scheduled for launch in India as well.

articles.title: LG Electronics will join hands with Nvidia, a global artificial intelligence (AI) infrastructure pow..
articles.author: unwritten
articles.summary: LG Electronics is partnering with Nvidia to launch next-generation AI technologies including physical AI models based on Nvidia's Isaac GR00T. They are also collaborating on a smart factory digital twin platform called 'Omniverse', and LG Electronics is seeking NVIDIA certification to supply its "CDU (Cool Water Distribution Unit)" liquid cooling device for AI servers.

articles.title: 1X Neo, First Humanoid Robot Built For Homes, Is Up For Pre-Order: Here's What It Can Do
articles.author: Tasneem Kanchwala
articles.summary: 1X, a US-based robotics company, has launched 'Neo', a humanoid robot designed for household chores. Neo can perform tasks such as cleaning, watering plants, and laundry, and is currently available for pre-order in the US with deliveries starting in 2026. The robot utilizes Redwood AI for learning and can be remotely supervised by 1X employees for complex tasks.

articles.title: Samsung's First Tri-Fold Phone Is Here: The Galaxy Z TriFold Officially Showcased
articles.summary: Samsung has showcased the Galaxy Z TriFold, a smartphone with a unique tri-fold design that transforms from a regular phone into a tablet-like display. It is expected to launch in select markets initially and could feature AI tools powered by Galaxy AI suite, including live translation and generative image features. The device boasts a 6.5-inch cover display that expands to around 10 inches when fully unfolded.

articles.title: Best Body Lotions on Myntra: Lasting Glow for Every Skin Type
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Joy introduces Bright Radiance Body Lotion, Plum launches BodyLovin' Vanilla Caramello Body Lotion, Nivea releases Cocoa Glow Serum-In-Lotion, and Vaseline presents Cocoa Nourish Body Lotion with hyaluron. These body lotions, available on Myntra, focus on hydration, nourishment, and radiant skin.

articles.title: US Home Robot: Luxury AI Assistant Arrives – Pricey!
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: 1X has made NEO robot available for pre-order, designed to tackle everyday tasks like laundry and cleaning for a price of $20,000 or $499 a month. The robot's functionality hinges on remote human controllers, while 1X envisions future autonomous operation through collected data. The $499 monthly rental option for NEO represents a growing trend: 'Robotics-as-a-Service' (RaaS).

articles.title: Drew Barrymore se remémore sa cure de désintoxication : « C'était l'enfer »
articles.author: Marita Alonso
articles.summary: An apparel company plans to promote its new line of high-end baby clothes. They intend to leverage customer profiling through an agency to target wealthy, young parents with advertising within partner apps. The company hopes to increase the visibility of their new baby clothes line by presenting targeted advertisements.

articles.title: Jio offers free Google AI Pro plan worth Rs 35,100 with select 5G packs: check ...
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Jio is offering a complimentary Google AI Pro plan with selected G packs. This offer provides users access to Google's advanced AI capabilities.

articles.title: Canva introduces AI that creates designs and understands like a human
articles.author: Md Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: Canva has introduced a new AI model capable of understanding and creating designs, expanding its design platform. The company has also launched Canva Grow, a marketing platform that integrates asset creation with performance measurement, and has announced new platform features including a form builder and an email design tool. Furthermore, Affinity design suite will now be free for all users, with plans to integrate it with Canva AI.

articles.title: The Last Mile of Excellence: Why Service Centers Are the Future of Customer Experience
articles.author: Pml Daily Editor
articles.summary: Uganda Baati is expanding its network of service centers across Uganda, increasing from a few outlets to twenty-three showrooms. These new centers provide local communities with professional guidance, roofing solution comparisons, technical support for contractors, and training for fundis, making the brand more accessible and fostering customer loyalty. This expansion represents Uganda Baati's commitment to customer service and building trust through accessibility.

articles.title: 'Best advent calendar' that's sold out for 3 years bags £935 of products for £89
articles.author: Rachael Davis
articles.summary: Avant Skincare is launching its Wonders Advent Calendar for 2025, featuring £935 worth of skincare products for £99. The calendar includes items like the Pro-Intense Hyaluronic Acid Illuminating Day Cream and introduces an augmented reality experience with potential Golden Tickets worth up to £1,000 in Avant Skincare products.

articles.title: Best SD memory card
articles.author: Best Reviews
articles.summary: The Lexar Professional 128GB 2000x UHS-II SDXC SD Memory Card offers high file transfer speeds and 128GB storage. The SanDisk Ultra 128GB Class 10 UHS-I SDXC SD Memory Card provides sturdy construction and file transfer speeds up to 80MB/s. The Samsung EVO Plus 512GB Class 10 MicroSD Memory Card delivers high transfer rates up to 90MB/s and 512GB of memory.

articles.title: Best SD memory card
articles.author: Best Reviews
articles.summary: Lexar introduces the Professional 128GB 2000x UHS-II SDXC SD Memory Card, which offers high file transfer speeds and durability. SanDisk offers the Ultra 128GB Class 10 UHS-I SDXC SD Memory Card, an affordable option with decent file transfer speeds, compatible with SDHC-I and SDXC-I devices. Samsung releases the EVO Plus 512GB Class 10 MicroSD Memory Card, a fast microSD card with 512GB of memory, suitable for 4K video.

articles.title: Cha Jing Campaign in Thailand Offers a Sensorial Experience via CJ WORX
articles.author: Bia Staff
articles.summary: General Beverage Co., Ltd has launched Cha Jing, a ready-to-drink Chinese tea, in Thailand. The launch campaign by CJ WORX focuses on scent rather than just flavor, positioning Cha Jing as a sensorial experience. The campaign draws from the visual language of luxury perfume films.

articles.title: WPP's turnaround blueprint under new CEO Cindy Rose
articles.author: Shilpashree Mondal 31
articles.summary: WPP launched WPP Open Pro, a new AI marketing platform edition aimed at small and mid-sized brands. It offers a self-serve option alongside the managed-service version of WPP Open, packaging strategy, content production, and publishing into one interface. Pricing will be based on user and usage.

articles.title: du collaborate with Hyperfusion to demonstrate AI-Powered video analytics solution
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: du, in collaboration with Hyperfusion, has launched a Generative AI video analytics solution. This solution is powered by advanced Generative AI.

articles.title: I Can't Overstate How Wildly Useful These 31 Things Are
articles.author: Lily Burrill
articles.summary: Several companies are introducing new products and services. Revlon released a hot air brush, marketed as a Dyson alternative. Bissell launched a portable multi-purpose carpet cleaner. Amazon offers the Echo Auto, designed as a personal assistant for drivers. iRobot has the Alexa-compatible Roomba with enhanced cleaning capabilities.

articles.title: 34 Beauty Items With Results Straight From Wonderland
articles.author: Karly Jacklin
articles.summary: Various companies have introduced new beauty and skincare products. Medicube launched a Turmeric Overnight Wrapping Peel Off Mask, while Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder. Mielle launched Rosemary Mint strengthening oil. These products and others cater to different skincare and beauty needs, from moisturizing to acne treatment, showcasing a range of innovative formulations and approaches.

articles.title: TDCX sees global outsourcing supercycle opportunity; Positions company for
articles.author: Media Outreach
articles.summary: TDCX Group unveiled a refreshed brand identity and tagline, "Enable the Future," to mark its 30th anniversary. To commemorate its 30th anniversary, TDCX is offering a complimentary CX Sentiment Analysis Report to help businesses decode customer sentiment and identify growth opportunities. The report provides actionable insights on customer perception, satisfaction, and loyalty drivers.

articles.title: TDCX Sees Global Outsourcing Supercycle Opportunity; Positions Company for Next Wave of Growth with Refreshed Brand
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: TDCX Group, a customer experience solutions firm, has unveiled a refreshed brand identity and tagline, "Enable the Future", to mark its 30th anniversary and its focus on AI. To commemorate its 30th anniversary, TDCX is offering a complimentary CX Sentiment Analysis Report to help businesses decode customer sentiment and identify growth opportunities. Its core engines are now augmented by embedded AI tools, analytics, and agile operating models designed to maximize performance and value creation.

articles.title: Neo cloud & GPUaaS reshape AI in Australia & New Zealand
articles.author: IT Brief Australia
articles.summary: Neo is offering cloud services and GPUaaS in Australia and New Zealand. These offerings are designed to be cost-effective and sustainable for AI applications.

articles.title: TDCX sees global outsourcing supercycle opportunity; Positions company for next wave of growth with refreshed brand
articles.author: Media Outreach
articles.summary: TDCX adopts the new tagline 'Enable the Future,' signaling its deepened capabilities in AI, CX, and human expertise. To celebrate 30 years of innovation, TDCX is releasing Complimentary CX Sentiment Scan Report

articles.title: TDCX sees global outsourcing supercycle opportunity; Positions company for next wave of growth with refreshed brand
articles.author: Media Outreach
articles.summary: TDCX introduces a new tagline, 'Enable the Future,' signaling its deepened capabilities through the convergence of AI, CX, and human expertise. They also launched Complimentary CX Sentiment Scan Report to celebrate 30 years of innovation.

articles.title: 23 Fall Amazon 'Most Wished For' Products
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: McCormick offers English Toffee finishing sugar, while Laneige introduces a pumpkin pie scent for their Lip Sleeping Mask. OPI launches RapiDry Quick Dry Nail Polish. Salt & Stone offers Santal & Vetiver body wash and Touchland releases "Confetti Cake" Power Mist hand sanitizer. Dawn introduces a fresh green apple scent to their PowerWash dishwashing spray. Sol de Janeiro offers Cheirosa 62 Hair And Body Fragrance Mist. Clinique presents tinted lip balm in Black Honey. Eos releases Shea Butter Vanilla Cashmere body lotion and Paris Hilton launches heart-shaped Dutch oven.

articles.title: BLK ALERTS - Canva Launches Its Own Design Model, Adds New AI Features to the Platform
articles.summary: Canva has launched its own design model. Furthermore, Canva has added new AI features to its platform.

articles.title: A humanoid robot will do all of your mundane chores for $20,000
articles.author: New York Post
articles.summary: 1X Technologies, a California-based tech company, is launching NEO, a 5'6" AI humanoid, in the US in early 2026. NEO is designed to perform household tasks like washing dishes and doing laundry.

articles.title: Canva introduces AI that creates designs and understands like a human
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Canva introduced a new AI model capable of understanding and creating designs, expanding its design platform. This announcement, made on October 30, included several product upgrades and new integrations designed to enhance the design process.

articles.title: FlowReel Dominates AI Video Generation with the Industry's Most Comprehensive Model Portfolio
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: A platform is revolutionizing AI video creation by integrating over 20 leading video AI models, offering creators access to a comprehensive collection of video generation tools and unprecedented creative freedom.

articles.title: PlayStation and Seagate have come together to make a new Astro Bot-themed external PS5 hard ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Sony and Seagate are launching a new Astro Bot PS5 external hard drive. The product is currently available for pre-order.

articles.title: Affinity says its new Adobe-rivaling creative app is ‘free forever' – here's how that really works
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Canva has announced that its new Affinity app will be free forever. This clarifies the app's business model and launch strategy.
